评论详情: I will be returning this.  The material is too clingy. Not flattering.
Love this dress. Fits comfortably and looks cute.
Dress is comfortable & flattering. Could wear to any event. Fabric is soft. I’m 5”4, 180 pds, bought XXL

评论概述: Cute and on the modest side.
评论详情: This dress is so cute! I love the cut and how it doesn't show too much skin. It also doesn't cling to your body bus still has a nice shape to it. The fabric is flowy and moves nicely. I would recommend this dress!
The material is lightweight and soft. It’s cut to perfection and really comfortable. It’s flattering and keeps me cool in the heat. I love that it has pockets.
This dress in my opinion is giving “hospital gown”.  It has no shape to it and just hangs.  While the material is very soft and comfortable I just can’t handle the style.  Runs big.

Love the fit. The side seams are cut to fit the waist so it gives a more feminine shape. The sleeves are really cute and don’t puff out. The fabric is lightweight and comfy for everyday wearing or dress it up with accessories. Hidden side pockets great for phone storage.

While the design and the print were cute - I got  the red floral, the fabric had a weird shiny finish and a strange feel to it when I put it on.  I was disappointed because the style is adorable, nice fit, cute sleeves and great pockets.  Someone else might just love it but the feel of the fabric was a deal breaker for me personally.

I immediately noticed the lack of shape to this dress when I opened it. The sides are straight and give you no shape at all. I'm disappointed with the style of it because it looked cute and has pockets!
This dress has pockets, a nice A shape and it is flowy. It is true to size. The fabric is medium weight and the print is colorful.

评论概述: Sleeves are tight in the shoulders
评论详情: I like this dress however the cute sleeve treatment makes it feel abnormally tighter than a regular cap sleeve. They are shorter than I hoped they would be as well. The photo shows the leaf pattern with three colors tan, brown and an army green. Mine only has tan and brown. The green would have made the pattern pop more. Oh well! I intend to wear it with black bike shorts under it, as a cute cruise outfit for leisure. I might just add a hat for good measure!

评论概述: Beautiful Summer A-Line Dress color xh235
评论详情: This dress is the perfect length for me, I am 5'5 and come just below the knees on me and I absolutely love the sleeves, they are a cross over sleeve, which looks quite lovely and different. The package was received quickly, the material is feels like its well made. I love that it has two pockets as well, the colors are vibrant and pattern is nice. I wore this on New Years Day in the afternoon, and was very excited to wear it. I received complements while wearing this dress, it just seem to fit me perfect in every way and its very very comfortable as well. I am very satisfied with this dress, and look forward to wearing it often.

I got this dress for my mom, and she’s been really happy with it. The flowy design is perfect for our beach outings and summer vacations, allowing her to stay cool and comfortable while enjoying the sun. The short sleeves and lightweight fabric make it easy to wear on hot days, and the A-line silhouette is flattering without being too tight. The quality feels good, and it looks like something much pricier. The dress holds up well after washing, staying soft and maintaining its shape.
This dress fits me perfectly.  I am 5'3" and 116 pounds and I purchased the small.
The best thing is this dress has pockets!!!!!  I also love that it is soft, comfortable to wear and flattering on. Everything you could ask for in a dress! Perfect for summer!

评论概述: Soft pretty dress.  Perfect for summer
评论详情: I love the pink color of this dress and the border design at the hem of the dress.  It is so comfortable and fits true to size.  It looks great on.  I can't wait to wear it this spring.
A very good looking ( Zw101 color - green palm fronds) medium length flared skirt dress. It fits very well in the recommended size and looks very good.

This dress caught my eye with it's fun pattern, and it did not disappoint!  The subtle ruffle detail on the shoulders and the adorable sleeves add such a nice touch.  And of course the pockets are a huge win! There's not much bulk to this dress, so it won't take up much space in your suitcase.  The fit is comfortable and leans a bit on the larger size, which is perfect if you prefer a looser fit. That said, if you like a more tailored look, consider sizing down.  Overall, it's a great design with cute details.
love this dress! it's lightweight for summer and the print is super cute. the fit is flattering too! for the price, i would buy again.

I have been looking for clothes to bring on my upcoming cruise.  This dress caught my eye.  It came in, and after I washed very impressed.  The pocket is a good size (inside out in the picture to try and show size.)  The material is lightweight and really comfortable.  I really like the print- picture is very accurate of what I received.  Happy with the choice-  totally worth it!!

I absolutely love everything about this lightweight, floral dress! The quality is exceptional and the material is super comfortable and breathable, with the perfect amount of stretch. It fits true to size with a slightly relaxed silhouette that is flattering on a variety of body types. The material doesn't fade or shrink after washing, nor does it have excessive wrinkles. It's super versatile and can be dressed up or down depending on accessories. It can also be layered under a sweater or blazer for cooler seasons. Highly recommend!

This has to be the perfect summer dress. Although it is designed for the beach, it is perfectly adaptable to just hanging out in the nice weather and its classic A-line makes it perfect for anything.  The dress is made of 95% polyester and 5% Spandex, and has just as much give as you need. It is airy, and with pockets, can just be a cover up, or something to wear shopping. A very nice well made dress, versatile and comfortable, and we recommend it.

评论概述: Zeagoo Womens Summer A Line Dress with Pockets
评论详情: This is a really nicely made dress and fits well.  I love the pockets and casual stretch of the fabric for a good fit.  It washes well and I hang dry mine.  I love the printed fabric and colors.  This is a nice dress for any casual occasion and all day comfortable wear.

This fits true to size in a loose, flowy way. It comes down to the lower calf on my 5’6” daughter. The material is lightweight, soft and comfortable. There is no stretch though, so be sure on the size you want. The design is very beautiful and a bit boho. The colors are muted and complimentary to the flowery design. There were a few loose threads here and there when it came out the package initially, but I found no sewing issues along any of the seams. Overall she’s very happy with this and I would buy again. Good value for price.

There was no sizing guide so I went with my usual size and it's a perfect fit. A simple, casual dress that does not look cheap. Absolutely love the pockets, and the design of the dress does not make the pockets look bulky and obvious. Can't wait to wear it out when warmer weather hits!

Nice colors and print. Well made dress. The fabric is a little thicker than I expected, not a bad thing. It has more body. I did size up. I am usually a L and order XL per size chart and that fits perfect. Looks good. It is a casual look though.

评论概述: Great summer dress with a very flattering fit & POCKETS
评论详情: Great summer dress with a very flattering fit.  I really like that the back has an elastic rucking to hold the bodice snugly without being too tight.  It doesn't squeeze or create any unflattering bulges.  I got the size S and was happy I did so because my bust is only size B bra cup and a larger size dress I probably would not fill out the bodice cups sufficiently, but in the size small everything fit well across my smaller size bust without being too tight on my chest.  The A-line skirt is simply wonderfully comfortable, floating away and creating a very flattering look.  I'm very pleased!

I ordered this sundress for my wife, who was absolutely delighted with it.  Along with being true to size and very comfortable to wear, she was quite pleased with both the  attractive colors and beautiful design of the dress. For that matter, the pockets are a great addition to the dress, as they are both stylish and functional.  Furthermore, not only does it match the pictures and description on the website, but my wife has received compliments on it from both friends and colleagues. In toto, this is an excellent dress set at a very reasonable price.  Highly Recommended!

This item is true to size and extremely soft  I love the longer length s most everything is. Dry short these days. Thr split sleeves at a nice detail and dress it up. The pockets are roomy and the neckline is not plunging. This product is made in China.
